info.title: Regulations.gov
info.description: Provides public users access to federal regulatory content.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.description: Format

parameters.name: docketId
parameters.description: Docket ID

400.description: Bad request. The content is either empty or has been withdrawn.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.description: Format

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: FDMS Document ID

parameters.name: federalRegisterNumber
parameters.description: Federal Register Document Number

400.description: Bad request. The document is only available for comment via Regulations.gov.

get.description: This API allows users to build a query based on any of the parameters below. If you have trouble building queries, you may wish to try them through the Advanced Search page on the Regulations.gov website.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.description: Format

parameters.name: countsOnly
parameters.description:
Counts Only:
  • 1 (will return only the document count for a search query)
  • 0 (will return documents as well)

parameters.name: encoded
parameters.description:
Encoded:
  • 1 (will accept Regulations.gov style encoded parameters)
  • 0 (will not accept such encoded parameters)

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: Keyword(s)

parameters.name: dct
parameters.description:
Document Type:
  • N: Notice
  • PR: Proposed Rule
  • FR: Rule
  • O: Other
  • SR: Supporting & Related Material
  • PS: Public Submission

parameters.name: dktid
parameters.description: Valid Docket ID (ex. SEC-2012-0044)

parameters.name: dkt
parameters.description:
Docket Type:
  • R: Rulemaking
  • N: Nonrulemaking

A Docket Type is either Rulemaking or Nonrulemaking. A Rulemaking docket includes the type of regulation that establishes a rule. While a Non-Rulemaking docket does not include a rule.

parameters.name: cp
parameters.description:
Comment Period:
  • O: Open
  • C: Closed

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: Federal Agency: List of accepted Federal Agency values. This field allows multiple values. Ex. a=FMCSA%252BEPA%252BFDA

parameters.name: rpp
parameters.description: Results Per Page 10, 25, 100, 500, 1,000.  Results per page may not exceed 1,000.

parameters.name: po
parameters.description:
Enter the page offset (always starts with 0). This is used in conjunction with results per page to provide large data sets. For example, if a search produces 82 results and the result per page is set to 25, this will generate 4 pages. 3 pages will have 25 results and the last page will have 7 results. Page offset values for each page will be: 
Page 1: po=0 Page 2: po=25 Page 3: po=50 Page 4: po=75
The total number of pages is [total results/results per page] and page offset for page X is [X-1 * results per page]

parameters.name: cs
parameters.description:
Comment Period Closing Soon:
  • 0 (closing today)
  • 3 (closing within 3 days)
  • 15 (closing within 15 days)
  • 30 (closing within 30 days)
  • 90 (closing within 90 days)

parameters.name: np
parameters.description:
Newly Posted:
  • 0 (posted today)
  • 3 (posted within last 3 days)
  • 15 (posted within last 15 days)
  • 30 (posted within last 30 days)
  • 90 (posted within last 90 days)
For periods of time beyond 90-days, please use a date range with the Posted Date parameter.

parameters.name: cmsd
parameters.description: Comment Period Start Date: Enter a date in the form of MM/DD/YY. Note: If the Comment Period End Date is also provided, then ensure the Comment Period Start date is earlier.

parameters.name: cmd
parameters.description:
Comment Period End Date: Enter a date in the form of MM/DD/YY. Note: If the Comment Period Start Date is also provided, then ensure the Comment Period End date is after.
* Comment Period Start and End Dates are mutually exclusive with the 'closing soon' parameter. If both are provided, 'closing soon' will be ignored.

parameters.name: crd
parameters.description: Creation Date: Enter a date in the form of MM/DD/YY. Accepts a single date or a date range. Ex. crd=11/06/13-03/06/14

parameters.name: rd
parameters.description: Received Date: Enter a date in the form of MM/DD/YY. Accepts a single date or a date range. Ex. rd=11/06/13-03/06/14

parameters.name: pd
parameters.description: Posted Date: Enter a date in the form of MM/DD/YY. Accepts a single date or a date range. Ex. pd=11/06/13-03/06/14

parameters.name: cat
parameters.description:
Document Category:
  • AD (Aerospace and Transportation)
  • AEP (Agriculture, Environment, and Public Lands)
  • BFS (Banking and Financial)
  • CT (Commerce and International)
  • LES (Defense, Law Enforcement, and Security)
  • EELS (Education, Labor, Presidential, and Government Services)
  • EUMM (Energy, Natural Resources, and Utilities)
  • HCFP (Food Safety, Health, and Pharmaceutical)
  • PRE (Housing, Development, and Real Estate)
  • ITT (Technology and Telecommunications)

parameters.name: sb
parameters.description:
Sort By:
  • docketId (Docket ID)
  • docId (Document ID)
  • title (Title)
  • postedDate (Posted Date)
  • agency (Agency)
  • documentType (Document Type)
  • submitterName (Submitter Name)
  • organization (Organization)
Sort Order is REQUIRED if this parameter is included.

parameters.name: so
parameters.description:
Sort Order:
  • ASC: Ascending
  • DESC: Descending

parameters.name: dktst
parameters.description: Docket Subtype: Only one docket subtype at a time may be selected. One or more agency values must be part of the request. Only values valid for the selected agency will be returned.

parameters.name: dktst2
parameters.description: Docket Sub-subtype: Only one docket sub-subtype at a time may be selected. One or more agency values must be part of the request. Only values valid for the selected agency will be returned.

parameters.name: docst
parameters.description: Document Subtype: Single or multiple document subtypes may be included. Multiple values should be passed as follows: docst=%20Certificate+of+Service%252BCorrespondence

400.description: Bad request. The document is only available for comment via Regulations.gov.
